description:
Mayura and Seigen face off against Kuranashi, but the Basara has a wicked trick up his sleeve. Does the daughter-father team stand a chance against the mastermind of the attack on Narukami?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiai no Reijuu: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
The Sacred Beast of Love: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
慈愛の霊獣 DAUGHTER`S FIGHT! FATHER`S DELIGHT
